# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), a boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0), and a steam engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5), a transport belt at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5), and a transport belt at position(x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have fuel before starting operations.
- Regularly check the fuel status of entities to avoid production stoppages.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electricity network to function properly.
- Verify that pipe groups are properly connected to boilers and steam engines.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients or source items
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients to process.
- Verify that burner inserters have source items to transport.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network to function properly.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
